de.iss.mv2.server.data

Class CertificateManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.server.data.CertificateManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CertificateManager, UnambiguityPovider<java.math.BigInteger>

    public class CertificateManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CertificateManager
    A CertificateManager that persists given certificates into a database.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SQLContext context
      The SQL context to access the database.
      private static java.lang.String CREATE_CERT
      The SQL command to store a new certificate into the database.
      private static java.lang.String LOAD_CERT
      The SQL command to load a certificate with the given serial number from the database.
      private static java.lang.String REMOVE_CERT
      The SQL command to remove a certificate from the database.
